descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/logog8pwa0hlvj.jpg[/img][/url]
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=6]EWIs Performance ENB:[/size][/color]
Welcome to my Page.
I present you my new enb, which is quite designed for performance, since it's based on the enbseries V0119.
so also intended for older systems and those who do not have a super computer.

[color=#00ffff]Features:[/color]
* vibrant and great colors and not too dark interiors and nights.
* SMAA
* Sharpen Effect
* Bloom
* Lens Effect
* Bokeh Tilt Shift DOF (performance tuned)
* Detailed Shadows
* Sunrays
* SkyLighting
* custom Sun, Sunsprite, Skystars and Galaxy Textures

Wish you much Fun with it.
ewi65
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
designed and optimized for:
* Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB
* Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - Lite
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Important:[/color]
You must have these options set in your SkyrimPrefs.ini that is located in your Documents/Skyrim folder:
fGamma=1.0000
iMaxAnisotropy=0
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=3
iWaterMultiSamples=0
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1

[color=#00ffff]Mod Organizer Users:[/color]
Mod Organizer makes and uses its own Skyrim.ini and Skyrimprefs.ini
located at Mod Organizer/profiles/your profiles name.
Turn off Anisotropic Filtering and Antialiasing in Skyrim Launcher and in your video card software. ENB’s AF is enabled by default.
If game crashing on startup, make sure you are not running XFire, Afterburner, EVGA andother kind of that tools.

"My game crashes (CTD) before I even get to the menu"
First ensure to have correct language in your Skyrim.ini, for example if you are using my ini-files you will have to adjust "sLanguage=ENGLISH" to your in-game used language.
After a fresh Windows installation (or you have a new Win 8, Win 8.1) you must update your DirectX runtime for DX9. Extract the files and start DXSETUP.exe. You probably either need DirectX updated or you installed a mod without installing another mod that it needs. Use LOOT to find out if it's the latter. LOOT requires Internet Explorer 11 to generate its report.

Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB and Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - Lite is also required.
[color=#ffff00]***************************
***************************[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Installation:[/color]
1. Download and copy all contents of the EWIs Performance ENB to your root Skyrim folder.
2. Download version 0119 of enbseries on enb.dev . Open the zip and copy the d3d9.dll from the Wrapper folder into your root Skyrim folder.
3. Download and install Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB (just the .esp).
4. Download and install  Enhanced Lighting for ENB ( ELE) - Lite.
5. Download and install Skyrim Particle Patch for ENB.
6. Download and install Skyrim Subsurface Scattering Patch for ENB.
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Recommended:
[/color]Realistic Water Two
Ethereal Clouds
SFO 2.0
Verdant - A Skyrim Grass Plugin
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Incompatible Mods:[/color]
Climates of Tamriel
Pure Weather
[color=#ffff00]***************************[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Credits and thanks to:[/color]
Boris - for ENBseries
Matso - enbbloom.fx
Kyo - enbsunsprite.fx
Confidence Man (NLA)
-- JayZ -- (ELE)
gp65cj04 - Bokeh DOF
[color=#ffff00]***************************
